text: The 2013 ICF Canoe Slalom World Championships took place from September 11 to 15, 2013 in Prague, Czech Republic under the auspices of International Canoe Federation (ICF) at the Prague-Troja Canoeing Centre. It was the 35th edition. Prague was the host city for the second time after hosting the event previously in 2006. The city was awarded the event at an ICF Board of Directors meeting in Budapest on 10 April 2010."The Results from the Event Bidding are in!" – International Canoe Federation (10 April 2010) article accessed 11 April 2010. ==Medal summary== ===Medal table=== ===Men=== ====Canoe==== {| class="wikitable" width=100% !
